OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100

STANDARD 100 by OEKO-TEX requires every component of a textiles product—including all thread, buttons, and trims—to be tested against a list of more than 1,000 harmful regulated and unregulated chemicals which may be harmful to human health. The assessment process is globally standardized, independently conducted, and updated at least once a year based on new scientific information or regulatory requirements. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

About this item

  • ACHIEVE VOLUMIOUS CURLS: Create beautiful, voluminous curls without damaging your hair using our heatless curl headband! It creates beautiful, heat-free curls or waves for the perfect classic look.
  • PERFECT FOR ALL: From straight to wavy and from long and medium hair and everything in between, this overnight curler covers it all, making this the best heatless curlers from teens to adults.
  • BYE BYE HAIR DAMAGE: Skip the damage on your hair routine and say hello to gorgeous hair! This no heat curling headband set includes a curling rod and two satin sleep scrunchies, all covered in high-quality, silky satin fabric.
  • EASY TO USE: Wrap your hair around the curling rod and secure it with the included scrunchies, then allow your hair to air dry or sleep on the curler and wake up to beautiful curls in the morning.
  • GREAT GIFT: This heatless rollers is a perfect gift for all hair types in any occasion. Easy, comfortable, and beautiful results! Ideal for family, friends, colleagues or simple a treat to yourself.

          How customer reviews and ratings work

          Customer Reviews, including Product Star Ratings help customers to learn more about the product and decide whether it is the right product for them.

          To calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we don’t use a simple average. Instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on Amazon. It also analyzed reviews to verify trustworthiness.

          Amazon Customer
          5 Stars
          Lasting Curls (even on a sweaty betty)
          I was pleasantly surprised at how well this works! It is easy to put in and my daughter was able to sleep in it overnight and it stayed in...even her curtain bangs stayed put. She said it wasn't uncomfortable at all.It's worked well when she leaves her "twist" hair towel on for about 20-30 minutes after her shower. Then, we wrap it before bed, which takes maybe 3-5 minutes, and she sleeps in it for around 9-10 hours. She leaves it on when getting ready for school. Make sure when removing that you pull the roller straight up. I would use a smoothing serum and run fingers through, but she likes the corkscrew curls. I recommend sleeping on a satin pillowcase.The best part? It stays all day, even in Florida humidity. She usually runs hot and sweats a bit during PE & recess (all outside). It relaxes a bit throughout the day, but still looks great when she gets home. It also looked nice the second day, but was more loose waves than curls. Again, sleeping on a satin pillowcase helps maintain overnight.We bought two more after the first time we used this one, one for me and one for my older daughter. I will try to remember to update once I use it on my older daughter's long, thicker hair.

          FL Family of 4
          5.0 out of 5 stars Lasting Curls (even on a sweaty betty)
          Reviewed in the United States on April 10, 2024
          Size: 1 Count (Pack of 1)Color: Sunset Tie DyeVerified Purchase
          I was pleasantly surprised at how well this works! It is easy to put in and my daughter was able to sleep in it overnight and it stayed in...even her curtain bangs stayed put. She said it wasn't uncomfortable at all.

          It's worked well when she leaves her "twist" hair towel on for about 20-30 minutes after her shower. Then, we wrap it before bed, which takes maybe 3-5 minutes, and she sleeps in it for around 9-10 hours. She leaves it on when getting ready for school. Make sure when removing that you pull the roller straight up. I would use a smoothing serum and run fingers through, but she likes the corkscrew curls. I recommend sleeping on a satin pillowcase.

          The best part? It stays all day, even in Florida humidity. She usually runs hot and sweats a bit during PE & recess (all outside). It relaxes a bit throughout the day, but still looks great when she gets home. It also looked nice the second day, but was more loose waves than curls. Again, sleeping on a satin pillowcase helps maintain overnight.

          We bought two more after the first time we used this one, one for me and one for my older daughter. I will try to remember to update once I use it on my older daughter's long, thicker hair.

          It's worked well when she leaves her "twist" hair towel on for about 20-30 minutes after her shower.           Mommy B
          5.0 out of 5 stars If I can do it, you can
          Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
          Size: 1 Count (Pack of 1)Color: Sunset Tie DyeVerified Purchase
          WOW! I have been looking for a way to get nice curls without using heat all the time. I was really skeptical because this looked like an option that took a lot of practice. If you want to look like the models while wearing the curler, it will take work, but the results are not dependent upon how tidy it looks when you put it on. I can't believe I was successful the first time. Pointers/tips/thoughts: 1. I am 51, which means my hair is dry. It's long, but because it's in a ponytail for working out or in a hat sometimes, and because I color it and heat it, I have a lot of breakage. So, I wrapped all of those shorter top strands first and secured them mid-way up the curling rod with my own silk pony tail holders. After that I wrapped the rest. 2. You only need the one rod, just as the kit comes. My hair is just below my shoulders when straight and there was plenty of rod left for longer hair. That said, a second kit could help to simply be able to wrap those shorter strands if you have the same problem I do. 3. Wrap your hair tightly. You secure the rod with a clip at the top of your head for wrapping (and then take it off), so a more narrow clip is better for getting that tight wrap. 4. There's no other need or metric for perfection in the wrap. It's idiot/klutz proof. I am the living example. 5. I put it in my dry hair before bed, but misted it lightly while doing the other things I needed to do before going to sleep. I think this was a good idea but probably isn't mandatory given how light my mist was. 6. I sleep on a bamboo pillowcase and I strongly believe that the results will be better on bamboo or silk. So while you are buying this product, which you really should if you are at all considering it, I would say also find a bamboo or silk pillow case. It's better for your hair in general and better for your skin too (I have one dedicated just for travel that I bring with me everywhere). But most importantly, you want to have a pillowcase that will not interfere with the results of the curler. 7. I think results would even be better with clean hair. Mine was on day 3 and when I put them in. I combed my hair, but it was otherwise looking terrible. Finally, 8. It was SO comfortable I forgot immediately that I had it on. There was zero interference in my sleep (sleep tracker confirms this statement).
          Pic of me right out of bed. I literally got up, put on my run clothes, took off the curlers, had a moment of amazement, and right away snapped the one pic. No fussing at all. I can't even imagine what it will look like when I have more experience. This was my first try. If this is bed head I look forward to many more mornings!!!!! (just bummed the first thing I had to do today was go for a run, and it rained- lol)

          4.0 out of 5 stars Does a decent job
          Reviewed in the United States on March 22, 2024
          Size: 1 Count (Pack of 1)Color: Sunset Tie DyeVerified Purchase
          I love the idea behind the heatless curling products, I have only used this twice so far so I feel like I need to use it at least 3-5 more times to get the hang of getting my hair tightly enough wrapped around the satin band.
          When you loosely wrap your hair it doesn't curl the hair a whole lot but it makes it wavy with pretty dang loose curls.. personally I don't like super loose curls, I prefer to actually see the definition of the curl. But like I said it just may be and most likely is a user error. Once I get the hang of it I can see that my curls will come out the way I hope.
          You may need to put some product in your hair before using to make sure the beautiful curls stay all day.

          Erika
          3.0 out of 5 stars An okay curl, for an insane amount of work.
          Reviewed in the United States on March 28, 2024
          Size: 1 Count (Pack of 1)Color: Sunset Tie DyeVerified Purchase
          This product was recommended to me on tiktok. I curl my hair often or will opt to blow dry it, so I decided to try this roll up curl method. It is a lot of work getting all of your hair to stay in place in order to roll up. I believe it wasn’t worth the struggle, and seeing as my hair isn’t even that thick, I can only imagine how long it might take others to roll up properly. My hair stayed in place for a while night and morning from about 10pm-11am and it was more of a sorry wave than curl. I would not recommend this product if you have thick or straighter hair. It doesn’t really give a full curl effect if that’s what your looking for and it wasn’t really a wave either, for me it was one wav through my whole hair. It almost looked like my hair had been in a messy bun all night.
